name: dominate
description:
Grow your blocks to steal your opponents pieces and dominate the board.
Challenge the computer or try outwit your friends in single player and multiplayer.
Earn awards by beating multiple stages on different difficulty modes.
Compete on the leaderboards for best score.
Play against opponents over the internet or play against a friend in a local 1v1 game.
Colour blind option for ease of use.
